lead_paragraph: DAVIDSON--Dick. Greater New York Hospital Association (GNYHA) mourns the passing of American Hospital Association (AHA) President Emeritus Dick Davidson. Across a remarkable career, including 16 years as AHA president, Dick's intellect, thoughtfulness, wisdom, wit, and deep commitment to the nation's hospitals personified health care leadership at its very best. Dick was a true industry giant who earned the respect and admiration of countless peers throughout the country, but above all he was a teacher. Because of Dick, America's hospitals are better, stronger places, and the patients they serve receive better care. We extend our deepest sympathies to his wife Janet, his sons and their families, and his many colleagues and friends. Wendy Z. Goldstein Chair, GNYHA Kenneth E. Raske President, GNYHA 1/3
